title: ‘WarGames’ Is Getting Revived As an Interactive Digital Short
text:
‘WarGames’ Is Getting Revived As an Interactive Digital Short 
Published By: Slashfilm.com - Today 
MGM is playing a game, and it would like you, the viewer, to join it. The studio announced today that it’s reviving WarGames as a video g...
